name: hologqlcontainer
description: A Holochain Container with GraphQL features

scripts.hc-package: npm run hc-package-happ1 && npm run hc-package-happ2
scripts.hc-package-happ1: cd hApp/hApp1/ && mkdir -p dist && hc package -o dist/bundle.json && cd ../..
scripts.hc-package-happ2: cd hApp/hApp2/ && mkdir -p dist && hc package -o dist/bundle.json && cd ../..

author: Ricardo Zylbergeld <ricardo@digitao.com.br> (http://www.digitao.com.br/)
